typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empname as string,
		{ dept} as string,
		{ salary} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees derive({ dept} = lower({ dept}),
		Newdept = iif(isNull({ dept}), 'unknown', lower({ dept}))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['deriveddata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employeedata
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		{ deptname} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> departmentdata
employeedata aggregate(groupBy(Department),
	totalemployees = count(Empid)) ~> Aggregate1
employeedata, departmentdata join(Department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['allemployeedeptdata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Allemployeedatabydept.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Empid,
		EmployeeName,
		Address,
		PhoneNumber,
		Salary,
		deptid,
		{ deptname}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2

source(output(
		ProductCode as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Quantity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
Aggregate1 derive(Quantity = replace(replace(replace(toString(Quantity),'[',' '),']',' '),'"','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source2 aggregate(groupBy(ProductCode,
		ProductName),
	Quantity = collect(Quantity)) ~> Aggregate1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ITemployees
source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HRemployees
source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Payrollemployees
ITemployees, HRemployees, Payrollemployees union(byName: true)~> UnionAllemployees
UnionAllemployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['allemployees.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
